he calmly walks up to the front of the bus with the head in his hand and the knife and just calmly stares at us and drops the head right in front of us
he put his bags in the overhead compartment he didn't say a word to anybody he seemed totally normal
when we came back on the bus he was cutting the guy's head off and pretty much gutting him up

we got him with a screamer last year and yeah we made him cry he will deny it but he gave us a lift to the pub and he came in and left his keys on the table we went out and moved his car then put the keys back he said goodbye and left he came back about five minutes later crying saying his car had been stolen he even called his mum

he kept holding his head in his hands saying it hurt you know and i was like take some aspirin or something he was being such a baby about it and then there was this smell it was like so bad he started screaming that he was burning up that's when it happened
he was just sitting there but when i started making noise he stood up let out this deep hiss and charged forward a little bit
